thread.title: BRIEF-Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust Terminates Jon Wheeler As Chairman and CEO

title: BRIEF-Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust Terminates Jon Wheeler As Chairman and CEO

organizations.name: brief-wheeler real estate investment trust terminates jon wheeler
brief-wheeler real estate investment trust termi
wheeler real estate investment trust inc

text:
January 30, 2018 / 1:27 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust Terminates Jon Wheeler As Chairman and CEO Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust Inc : 
* WHEELER REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST, INC. TERMINATES JON S. WHEELER AS CHAIRMAN, CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND PRESIDENT AND NAMES DAVID KELLY AS CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND PRESIDENT 
* WHEELER REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST INC - ‍WHEELER ALSO RESIGNED HIS POSITION FROM BOARD OF DIRECTORS​ 
* WHEELER REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST INC - ‍NAMED DAVID KELLY AS CO‘S CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND PRESIDENT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
